Bɔne A Adam Yɛeɛ Ne Akyire Asɛm
Na ɔwɔ yɛ ɔdaadaafoɔ wɔ wiram mmoadoma a Awurade Onyankopɔn abɔ wɔn no nyinaa mu
Ɔwɔ no kɔɔ ɔbaa no nkyɛn kɔbisaa no sɛ, “Enti, ɛyɛ ampa ara sɛ
Onyankopɔn se, ‘Monnni turo yi mu aduaba biara?’ ” Ɔbaa no buaa ɔwɔ sɛ
Yɛtumi di nnua a ɛwɔ turo yi mu no so aduaba biara, nanso Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ
Ɛnsɛ sɛ yɛdi dua a ɛsi turo no mfimfini no so aduaba
na ɛnsɛ sɛ yɛde yɛn nsa mpo ka, anyɛ saa a, yɛbɛwuwu
Na ɔwɔ no ka kyerɛɛ ɔbaa no sɛ, “Morenwuwu
Onyankopɔn nim sɛ, ɛda a mobɛdi no ara pɛ, mo ani bɛba mo ho so
ama moayɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn, na moahunu papa ne bɔne

ɛde bi ma ne kunu a na ɔne no wɔ hɔ maa ɔno nso diiɛ
Wɔdi wieeɛ no, wɔn baanu ani baa wɔn ho so
na wɔhunuu sɛ wɔn nyinaa da adagya

Na Onyankopɔn bisaa no sɛ, “Hwan na ɔka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ na woda adagya
Gyama dua a meka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ, nni so aba no, woadi nʼaba no bi
Adam kaa sɛ, “Aane. Ɔbaa no a wode no maa me sɛ me ne no ntena no
ɛna ɔde aduaba a ɔte firii dua no so no brɛɛ me ma mediiɛ

Esiane saa adeɛ a woayɛ yi enti, “Wɔadome wo wɔ mmoa nyinaa ne nkekaboa mu
Wobɛwea wʼafuru so, na wo nkwa nna nyinaa woadi mfuturo

ɔyea mu na wobɛwo mma. Yei nyinaa akyiri no
wʼani bɛgyina wo kunu na ɔbɛdi wo so.” Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Adam nso sɛ

Na Kanaan woo nʼabakan Sidon
ne Het
Yebusifoɔ, Amorifoɔ, ne Girgasifoɔ, Hewifoɔ, Arkifoɔ, Sinifoɔ, Arwadfoɔ, Semarifoɔ ne Hamatifoɔ
Akyire yi,
Kanaanfoɔ mmusua no peteeɛ
Kanaan nsase
ahyeɛ trɛ firii Sidon kɔduruu
Gerar de kɔsii Gasa
kɔduruu Sodom ne Gomora,
Adma, Seboim de kɔsi Lasa
Yeinom ne Ham asefoɔ a
wɔn mmusuakuo, wɔn kasa
wɔn nsase ne wɔn aman da wɔn adi.
Sem Asefoɔ
Sem a na ne nua panin yɛYafet
no nso woo mmammarima.
Sem nananom ne Eber mma.
Sem asefoɔ nie
Elam, Asur, Arfaksad, Lud ne Aram
Aram asefoɔ nie
Us, Hul, Geter ne Mas
Na Arfaksad woo Sela
ɛnna Sela woo Eber
Eber woo mmammarima baanu
Abakan no din de Peleg
a asekyerɛ ne
“nkyekyɛmu” ɛfiri sɛ,
ne berɛ so na nnipa a wɔwɔ ewiase mu kyekyɛ kɔɔ kasa ahodoɔ mu
na wɔbɔ hweteeɛ
Nʼakyiri ba no din de Yoktan
Yoktan woo Almodada, Selef, Hasarmawet,
Yera, Hadoram, Usal, Dikla
Obal, Abimael, Seba, Ofir, Hawila ne Yobab
Asase a wɔte so no trɛ firi
Mesa kɔsi Sefar
ɔmantam a ɛda bepɔ so wɔ apueeɛ fam no
Yeinom ne Sem mmammarima
sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua ɛne wɔn kasa
wɔn nsase ɛne wɔn
amanaman te no.
Yeinom ne Noa mmammarima mmusua
sɛdeɛ wɔn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ te wɔ wɔn amanaman mu
Na ɛfiri yeinom mu na nsuyire no akyiri amanaman petee asase so.
